post.body: LMAO, I never have a good brooding look. I just look stupid if you ask me.
That's cool. :) I guess I never thought of selling hosting that way. LOL
LOL, it's been so long since I've been on ebay, I didn't realize people actually sold hosting on there.
So am I, that's why I use itweet.net - it refreshes itself every couple of minutes.
Is tired of her current theme at Gothic Peach, but simply doesn't have the umph necessary to do new graphics for it.
Working on cleaning up sidebars on Gothic Peach. Also considering whether or not to "freshen" up the theme.
Considering a giveaway for Gothic Peach again. Not sure what to give away though. LOL
Blogged: And the winner is... - Gothic Peach - http://tinyurl.com/8cdhty
WTF - a train has been doing one constant horn blast for at least 5 minutes now.
WTF?? Is the internet drunk or something? Everything is so f'n slow!
I'm in a mood - not drunk, just in a mood.
Then again - so did working New Year's Eve.
That stinks. :(
I am now following 76 people - I have 96 following me. My number of tweeples I'm following has gone up - my number of followers has not. :(
Argh - SuperPets app not loading properly.
Ok, Happy New Year's, 20 min early for the west coast, 40 min late for mtn, 1:40 late for central, and 2:40 for eastern
My pet raccoon (superpets app on myspace) is asleep. Adorable. LOL Now, I must go to bed. Night all!
Sad but true, I use MySpace more for the SuperPets app than anything else now.
I'm quiet on Twitter - possibly because I don't like to use my phone - no text pkg on it.
Building up meaningful connections easily with MrTweet, my personal networking assistant. See how he can help u too! http://mrtweet.net?c=12
